Name: Heard It Through The Grapevine
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and frozen grapes.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Created by Alex Morrell in 2015 at Central and Co. in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Heard It Through The Grapevine contains 119 calories
